com.wacooky.audio.player

Class DAC

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wacooky.audio.player.DAC

  • public abstract class DAC
extends java.lang.Object
    DAC DAC is a convenient class for playing one-bit audio fine through audio interface. DAC crates a org.justcodecs.dsd.Decoder with appropriate org.justcodecs.dsd.DSDFormat fro given file and opens audio interface and format one-bit data of Decoder output according to Mixer.Info and DoP capable flag.
    Version:
    0.9 2016-05-05
    Author:
    fujimori

      • audition

        public static com.wacooky.task.SimpleTask<java.lang.Object> audition(javax.sound.sampled.Mixer.Info mixerinfo,
                                                                     boolean canDoP,
                                                                     java.lang.String path,
                                                                     long fromSamples,
                                                                     long samples,
                                                                     javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<java.lang.Number> theListener,
                                                                     com.wacooky.task.TaskCallback callback)
        audition
        Parameters:
        mixerinfo - mixer info or null for default mixer
        canDoP - DoP capability of the given mixer
        path - path to audio file
        fromSamples - audition start sample count of input file.
        samples - audition duration sample count of input file.
        theListener - samplesProperty listener (output side)
        callback - TaskCallback
        Returns:
        SimpleTask<Object>
